Title: Doppelgangland
Plot: While unknowingly participating in a spell with the wish-granting demon Anyanka in order for her to get her powers back, Willow accidentally brings forth the vampire Willow from Cordelia's alternate universe.    The vampire Willow sets her sights on turning Sunnydale into the vampire-ruled world she knows but when she learns of her counterpart, she decides to make Willow send her back. After trying to seduce Willow and freaking her out a bit, the vampire Willow is captured. The real Willow, dres
GuestStars: Andy Umberger, Corey Michael Blake, Michael Nagy, Megan Gray, Norma Michaels, Ethan Erickson, Jason Hall, Harry Groener, Alexis Denisof, Emma Caulfield, Eliza Dushku, Armin Shimerman
